string.text: There will be no shooting unless I give the order. No itchy trigger fingers, understood?
Victory!!! Everyone, who's alive, get over here. Come, Marked One - we need to talk.
Good, Marked One. Glad you're alive and decided to pay us a visit. Come over, and we'll have a chat. There's a little something coming up.
Excellent, your task is complete. Safe to say you've learned the basic skills.
Marked One, the way to the camp is now open to you. Come over and we'll talk.

A word about Strelok, Marked One. A stalker just came back from a long raid. Fox he's called. Looks like he had a pretty rough time and he's asking for help. Some weird beasts followed him all the way back, he says he won't hold out much longer. I reckon the fella will know a bit about Strelok. Here are the coordinates. You might wanna hurry up though.
Poor show, Marked One. The boys are dead, although that ain't exactly your fault. These things happen in the Zone. Anyway, you passed the test so get back here and we'll talk business.
Good job, Marked One. Keep it up and you'll make yourself a few friends. Pay me a visit and we'll talk business.
That wasn't very smart, Marked One. You passed the test but you're gonna have to deal with Wolf and his goons on your own now. Anyway, I'm waiting for you. We got more work to talk about.

Marked One, the military dug up some interesting stuff at the Agroprom Research Institute. I'd like to get my hands on it and you probably would too. Get the info and take it to the barman at the stalkers' bar. Now get moving!
Watch out! You're right next to the anomalies. Use your bolts to work out their exact location and shape.

Press Contact ($$ACTION_CONTACTS$$). People within 250 meters of you who have turned their PDAs will become visible in Contacts and on your visor Minimap. You will also see their attitude towards you, so you can look out for potential enemies. However, bandits and mutants (har har) don't usually turn their PDAs on, so be careful!
To talk to someone, aim at them and press '$$ACTION_USE$$'.
Find the artifact in the area marked on the map and take it to the trader.
Pay attention, Marked One. Next time it could be you.
Marked One! Forget the artifact, you'll drop it off later. Get to the trailer by the road ASAP. My boys need help there. The idiots opened fire at a passing chopper. I've sent you the coordinates.
Search the bodies - you might find something useful.
%c[255,255,118,118]Data received. Look for Information tab in PDA. New task added.%c[default]
%c[255,255,118,118]Hey, pal! Get out of here. We're nervous - can shoot you anytime.%c[default]

%c[255,255,118,118]Look, that one-eyed moron was a real asshole. We tied him but he broke away and took Siviy's AK so I've got to wipe him. His flash and other stuff are in stash on Bar's backyard, here's the place.%c[default]
%c[255,255,118,118]Listen, man! Come here, I have a business for you.%c[default]

%c[255,255,118,118]There is strange anomaly in a cabin near the ruins! I want to pick new art but anomaly keeps me away. And those air jittering around... Something is not right here, but I believe one can reach art... I got it! You just need to find proper sequence!%c[default]
%c[255,255,118,118]Man, we've got a zoo with a psycho ward here! We need your help.%c[default]
%c[255,255,118,118]TASK: Wipe out the mute before he'll turn scouts in zombies.%c[default]
Oh... We barely made it. Listen, man, go to our base. We want to return our debt to you as Jah demands.
%c[255,255,118,118]Duty blockpost: Look, there's somebody here! Some dumbass.%c[default]
%c[255,255,118,118]Duty blockpost: So, who want to teach a lesson to thief?%c[default]
%c[255,255,118,118]Somebody, respond, I'm begging you! We need help, people are dying here. We're kicked of Bar and now we're in Bar backyard near east blockpost...%c[default]
%c[255,255,118,118]Stalker, proceed slowly, with weapon strapped! If you're cool, we can talk.%c[default]
%c[255,255,118,118]Client was escaped, missin failed. Thank's a lot, Marked One!%c[default]
%c[255,255,118,118]Guards are coming, three men, shoot it!%c[default]
%c[255,255,118,118]Marked One, get RPG in barn corner and wipe out that APC! Fast!%c[default]
%c[255,255,118,118]You're feeling sick, may be it's artifact impact!%c[default]

%c[255,255,118,118]Wriggler:\n "Found unfamilliar artifact last wednesday. It's funny - looks like a hive. I hid it in one of my four stashes, here in swamp, but now I can't remember in which. Need to check it all, but I'm feeling sick..."%c[default]
%c[255,255,118,118]Artifact, that I hid in safe, created some anomaly and it don't let me out! I'll try to activate artifact, may be it'll help. But what was the code... Shit!%c[default]
%c[100,50,250,50]Master, remember numbers on dispensers - you'll need it...%c[default]
%c[255,255,118,118]Guys, let's tell them that stealing is bad!%c[default]
%c[255,255,118,118]You're hell of a man as you defeated such an enemy. Come to my office, we need to talk. Voronin.%c[default]
%c[100,50,250,50]Hey, stalker! I'm in your backpack, enable me!%c[default]
%c[100,50,250,50]Don't afraid of me, just find me in your backpack and enable!%c[default]
%c[100,50,250,50]Master, I can give you a hint about this task!%c[default]
%c[100,50,250,50]Master, I know what to do. Try to find portal that transfer you to the cabin.%c[default]
%c[100,50,250,50]Master, I remembered something! Please ask me!%c[default]
%c[100,50,250,50]Master, take a rest and talk with me...%c[default]
%c[255,255,118,118]Anomal zone in Cordon: sensor is indicating artifact presence%c[default]
%c[255,255,118,118]Anomal zone on Garbage: sensor is indicating artifact presence%c[default]
%c[255,255,118,118]Anomal zone on Dark Valley: sensor is indicating artifact presence%c[default]
%c[255,255,118,118]Anomal zone on Wild Territory: sensor is indicating artifact presence%c[default]
%c[255,255,118,118]Anomal zone on Yantar: sensor is indicating artifact presence%c[default]
%c[255,255,118,118]Anomal zone on Military Warhouses: sensor is indicating artifact presence%c[default]
%c[255,255,118,118]Anomal zone on Pripyat: sensor is indicating artifact presence%c[default]
%c[100,50,250,50]Anomaly is recharging, you can't pull out an artifact.%c[default]
%c[255,255,118,118]All is ok! We threw out that dick.%c[default]
%c[255,255,118,118]And those assholes that came with him?%c[default]
%c[255,255,118,118]Second part of Magnet is too far.%c[default]
%c[100,50,250,50]Gunslinger, wait! I forgot to tell you something.%c[default]
%c[255,255,118,78]What are you doing?! Stop it now!%c[default]
%c[100,50,250,50]Gunslinger, come visit me. I remembered something interesting.%c[default]
%c[255,255,118,78]Stalker, you attacked my courier! You'll regret it. Now you're not welcome to trade with me. And other traders will be warned about you too.%c[default]
%c[255,255,118,78]Pay the guard if you want to come in%c[default]
%c[100,50,250,50]Master, Kolya is somewhere here. He's dead... but I can feel his soul. It's anxious, looking for me. Let's find Kolya's corpse.%c[default]
%c[100,50,250,50]Oh, Kolya... Died here while looking for me. And his soul can't rest in peace. Master, I can help! I need Kolya's artifact.%c[default]
%c[100,50,250,50]Master, I'm done with artifact. Now Kolya may rest in peace. Thanks for your help! If you'll keep me, I'll help you further with your quests.%c[default]
